text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires confirmation that the Reporting Cadence of the GAAR Defense control is set at a minimum frequency of quarterly updates to the Audit Committee. In Section 1.C (GAAR Exposure), Control Points 3.1 and 3.2 explicitly list 'Quarterly' as the Reporting Cadence. Furthermore, the summary table in Section 2 confirms that the 'Quarterly Compliance Dashboard' includes metrics related to GAAR risk assessment, which aligns with the required quarterly reporting for this highly critical area.", "criterion_id": "31bc88c7-9bb4-4cb0-a9f5-8499628bdaf1"}
